channel.title: Suggestion For Mopar Rules
channel.description:
[b]Anyone That Abuses the Forums rules will be perminantly IP banned![/b]
[b]1.) No Bad language[/b] [i]Anyone caught using bad language will be muted for seven days Anyone caught spamming Pornography pictures over the forums will be perminantly muted[/i]
[b]2.) No Fake Development Topics[/b] [i]Anyone that does fake development topics will get a topic locked Please do not make fake development topics inless you really mean you are going to make the development please do not advertise you'r forums link in the topic please[/i]
[b]3.) Respect GMods and Admins[/b] [i]Deeply respect the Global Mods And Admins Please Anyone Caught Giving An Global Mod Or Admin Abuse Will Be Banned From The Forums[/i]
[b]4.) No Advertisement[/b] [i]Anyone Caught Advertising Website/Forum Links Will Modarated For 30 days! That means no posts no reply to nothing inless an admin says[/i]
[b]5.) No Double Posting[/b] [i]Double Post Just Causes Spam On The Forums That Means More Work For The Global Mods And Admins[/i]
[b]6.) No Ranting[/b] [i]Anyone who rants someone is just as bad Ranting is abusing someone because of somthing please do not do it![/i]
[b]7.) No Spamming Or Flaming[/b] [i]Anoyone Who Is Flaming And Muteing For Fun Will Get A Mute For 2 Days Or More You May Flame Someone In The Flame Section No Other Place Or Same Thing Mute! [/i]
[b]8.) No Asking For Personal Information[/b] [i]No asking for or providing personal information on this forum We are not trying to be unfriendly but i want to keep this safe for young users If you are caught trying this you will have bad results like ban for 5-10 days or muted for 30 [/i]
[b]9.) No Spelling Wrong On Purpose[/b] [i]Don't spell stuff like "y for why" and ect. If you do you will recieve a 2 day warning. Next time you do a moderation for 5 days Next Time a Mute for 20 days.[/i]
[b]10.) No Posting Viruses Period[/b] [i]If you do you will get a 10 day ban 15 day mute 20 day moderation and 30 day warning. This is a heavy rule.[/i]
[b]11.) Do Not Abuse Your Powers[/b] [i]If you do you will be demoted and warned for 2 days. This depends on what level you are. Also do not talk in locked topics.[/i]
[b]12.) Do Not Test Features[/b] [i]They will usually work the following not to be tested are -Visual Warning -New Themes[/i]
[b]13.) Do Not Give Reputation Rewards[/b] [i]This i just not fun it is also a waste of rep++ giving because rep++ is supposed to be given out when something is liked.[/i]
[b]14.) No Giving Admin/Mod Spots For Projects Or Linking To Your Forum Or Site[/b] [i]This is just plain common sense not to advertise also admin/mod rule was from mopar regular rules. This will result in a 7-10 day mute.[/i]
[center][b]Follow The Rules And You Will Not Get Off Too Badly Remember To Post And Be Active Also You Could Call That A Rule ;)[/b][/center]
[center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] double post[/center]

Alot of them are moparscape related and otherwise already covered by current rules.

You need to keep your typing consistent, it appears Sometimes You Just Randomly Type Like This

item.title: Suggestion For Mopar Rules
item.dc:creator: @guthan_software guthan software
item.description:
@guthan_software wrote:

Anyone That Abuses the Forums rules will be perminantly IP banned!

1.) No Bad language
Anyone caught using bad language will be muted for seven days
Anyone caught spamming Pornography pictures over the forums will be perminantly muted

2.) No Fake Development Topics
Anyone that does fake development topics will get a topic locked
Please do not make fake development topics inless you really mean you are going to make the development
please do not advertise you’r forums link in the topic please

3.) Respect GMods and Admins
Deeply respect the Global Mods And Admins Please Anyone Caught Giving An Global Mod Or Admin Abuse Will Be Banned From The Forums

4.) No Advertisement
Anyone Caught Advertising Website/Forum Links Will Modarated For 30 days!
That means no posts no reply to nothing inless an admin says

5.) No Double Posting
Double Post Just Causes Spam On The Forums That Means More Work For The Global Mods And Admins

6.) No Ranting
Anyone who rants someone is just as bad
Ranting is abusing someone because of somthing
please do not do it!

7.) No Spamming Or Flaming
Anoyone Who Is Flaming And Muteing For Fun Will Get A Mute For 2 Days Or More
You May Flame Someone In The Flame Section No Other Place Or Same Thing Mute!

8.) No Asking For Personal Information
No asking for or providing personal information on this forum
We are not trying to be unfriendly but i want to keep this safe for young users
If you are caught trying this you will have bad results like ban for 5-10 days or muted for 30

9.) No Spelling Wrong On Purpose
Don’t spell stuff like “y for why” and ect.
If you do you will recieve a 2 day warning.
Next time you do a moderation for 5 days
Next Time a Mute for 20 days.

10.) No Posting Viruses Period
If you do you will get a 10 day ban 15 day mute 20 day moderation and 30 day warning.
This is a heavy rule.

11.) Do Not Abuse Your Powers
If you do you will be demoted and warned for 2 days.
This depends on what level you are.
Also do not talk in locked topics.

12.) Do Not Test Features
They will usually work the following not to be tested are
-Visual Warning
-New Themes

13.) Do Not Give Reputation Rewards
This i just not fun it is also a waste of rep++ giving because rep++ is supposed to be given out when something is liked.

14.) No Giving Admin/Mod Spots For Projects Or Linking To Your Forum Or Site
This is just plain common sense not to advertise also admin/mod rule was from mopar regular rules.
This will result in a 7-10 day mute.

[center]Follow The Rules And You Will Not Get Off Too Badly
Remember To Post And Be Active Also
You Could Call That A Rule [/center]

[center] double post[/center]

Read full topic
